reviews.review_msg: Budra is great! His lectures are super engaging and he held a lot of space for student discussions and following our own interests. He's an older white guy so sometimes says things that are a bit out of touch but is still open to discussion on changing language and progressive topics. Keep up on readings and speak up in class and you'll be golden.

Where to begin about Dr. Budra! I had him for two classes this semester and his lectures were among my favourite that I have taken in post secondary. Not only is he hilarious, but I really enjoyed the structure of his courses. The readings for both classes were very interesting and engaging and the grading for the papers was fair. Take his class!!!
